universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Class TextGraphicsInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.GraphicsInfo
      • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.TextGraphicsInfo

  • public class TextGraphicsInfo
extends GraphicsInfo
    A GraphicsInfo implementation that can be used for text drawing purpose.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    ColorGraphicsInfo

      • fromTextAppearanceStyle

        public boolean fromTextAppearanceStyle(@NonNull
                                       Context context,
                                       @StyleRes
                                       int resId)
        Initializes text appearance parameters of this info from a style with the specified resId.
        Parameters:
        context - Context used to parse text appearance attributes.
        resId - Resource id of the TextAppearance style from which to parse attributes.
        Returns:
        True if text appearance attributes has been updated, false otherwise.

      • getAppearance

        @NonNull
public TextAppearance getAppearance()
        Returns the text appearance object holding all text graphics related attributes set to this info.
        Returns:
        TextAppearance of this text graphics info.

      • updatePaint

        public boolean updatePaint(@Nullable
                           int[] stateSet)
        Updates a text size, color and typeface of this info's paint to the actual hold by this info.
        Specified by:
        updatePaint in class GraphicsInfo
        Parameters:
        stateSet - The state set for which to pick the color.
        Returns:
        True if some setting of the paint has been changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        updatePaintTextSize(), updatePaintColor(int[]), updatePaintTypeface()

      • updateTextSize

        public boolean updateTextSize(float textSize)
        Updates a text size of this info to the specified one.
        Parameters:
        textSize - The desired text size to update to.
        Returns:
        True if text size has been changed and paint updated, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        TextAppearance.setTextSize(float), updatePaintTextSize()

      • updateTextColor

        public boolean updateTextColor(@Nullable
                               ColorStateList colors,
                               @Nullable
                               int[] stateSet)
        Updates a text color of this info to the specified colors.
        Parameters:
        colors - The colors list from which to pick one color and update paint with.
        stateSet - State for which to pick actual color for paint.
        Returns:
        True if color has been changed and paint updated, false otherwise.

      • updatePaintColor

        public boolean updatePaintColor(@Nullable
                                int[] stateSet)
        Updates a color of this info's paint according to the specified stateSet from the actual colors hold by this info.
        Parameters:
        stateSet - The state set for which to pick the color.
        Returns:
        True if color within the paint has been changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        TextAppearance.updatePaintColor(Paint, int[])

      • updateTypeface

        public boolean updateTypeface(@Nullable
                              Typeface typeface,
                              int style)
        Updates a typeface of this info to the specified one.
        Parameters:
        typeface - The desired typeface to update to. May be null to create default one from the specified style.
        style - One of Typeface.NORMAL, Typeface.BOLD, Typeface.ITALIC or Typeface.BOLD_ITALIC.
        Returns:
        True if typeface has been changed and paint updated, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        updatePaintTypeface()

      • calculateTextBounds

        @NonNull
public Rect calculateTextBounds(@NonNull
                                          String text)
        Calculates bounds for the specified text via Paint.getTextBounds(String, int, int, Rect) using this info's paint.
        Parameters:
        text - The text for which to calculate its bounds.
        Returns:
        Calculated bounds that should be used to properly position the text on a canvas.
